events.name: EV battery supply chain decarbonization
events.wd_description: The decarbonization of the EV battery supply chain focuses on reducing CO2 emissions from both the production of batteries and the materials that make up the batteries.
events.description: The decarbonization of the EV battery supply chain focuses on reducing CO2 emissions from both the production of batteries and the materials that make up the batteries.

events.name: embodied emissions
events.wd_description: The emissions from the production of EVs are mainly embodied emissions due to decarbonized electricity production.
events.description: The emissions from the production of EVs are mainly embodied emissions due to decarbonized electricity production.

events.name: decarbonizing production
events.wd_description: Efforts to decarbonize the production of materials used in EVs, such as steel and aluminum, are crucial for reducing the carbon footprint of EVs.
events.description: Efforts to decarbonize the production of materials used in EVs, such as steel and aluminum, are crucial for reducing the carbon footprint of EVs.

events.name: lithium supply chain
events.wd_description: The supply chain for lithium, a key material in EV batteries, involves various processes and has significant environmental impacts.
events.description: The supply chain for lithium, a key material in EV batteries, involves various processes and has significant environmental impacts.

events.name: hium extraction
events.wd_description: Lithium extraction involves both brine and hard rock mining, with each method having different environmental impacts.
events.description: Lithium extraction involves both brine and hard rock mining, with each method having different environmental impacts.

events.name: hium processing
events.wd_description: The processing of lithium into battery-grade materials involves various chemical and mechanical processes.
events.description: The processing of lithium into battery-grade materials involves various chemical and mechanical processes.

events.name: hium hydroxide production
events.wd_description: Lithium hydroxide is produced through different methods compared to lithium carbonate, and it is crucial for high-nickel cathode materials.
events.description: Lithium hydroxide is produced through different methods compared to lithium carbonate, and it is crucial for high-nickel cathode materials.

events.name: act assessment
events.wd_description: Life cycle assessments (LCA) are used to evaluate the environmental impacts of different lithium extraction and processing methods.
events.description: Life cycle assessments (LCA) are used to evaluate the environmental impacts of different lithium extraction and processing methods.
